name: Strung
description:
You wake up in a world that's different from what you remember.

Different, and yet familiar.

But is it the world that's different? Or is it you that's different?

A short surreal game about senses. How will you deal with the world around you?

FEATURES:

  • 3 endings
  • Interact with objects with point-and-click mechanics
  • Original art, story, and music
  • 15-20 mins per playthrough

**Content Warning: Depression and implied suicide.**

Created for Spooktober Jam.

If you support us with $2, you can get the files for the artwork and the soundtrack for this game!
